name: My Little Stall
description:
A great storm destroyed everything you worked for. Now it's time for a startover. Descover fruits and vegetables, build up your stall again.

Help the world rediscover the lost fruits of the world. Follow your dream and be the best. Gather fruits, vegtables and resources, solve Quick Challenges in this fun classic Match 3 game.

  • 120 levels to complete
  • Vivid graphics
